Guarino_Theme.content: Welcome into the theme settings, feel free to edit whatever you want!

properties.banner_Text_description: Feel free to drop a line!

properties.column1_Text_description: How to Boost your sales even without coding knowledge

properties.column2_Text_description: Pay trough your crypto wallet or by secured Gateways like Paypal or Stripe!
properties.column2_Text_description2: Everything is automatic and encrypted by Sellix HTTPS Protocol, dont worry of anything, you have a 100% guaranteed service at your disposal

properties.column3_Text_description: Pre-built theme editor, product features and gateways
properties.column3_Text_description2: We are here to help you trough the entire opening and maintaning process or any type of information/problem you have.Feel free to ask whatever you want!
